ygData.subject: Archmages and Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: My opinion on both, are that if you can get one of each by each other, like this, You will have a quickly healing archmage, so that you can spawn Fire

My opinion on both, are that if you can get one of each by each other, like 
this,
   You will have a quickly healing archmage, so that you can spawn Fire       
  Elementals quickly.
|--| |--|   Oh, and Chain Lightning rules.
